explanation: [0-0] On a muddy ground, a brown cow has fallen into a deep pit. The bucket of an excavator is extended forward above the cow. An elderly man wearing a gray short-sleeved shirt and camouflage pants, facing left and leaning forward slightly, is watching. A man in a black short-sleeved shirt is standing to the left of the excavator, facing left. To the left, there is a person wearing a dark gray short-sleeved shirt and shorts. On the right side, there is a shed with metal pillars and a gray roof. In front is a green field with some trees. The sky is grayish-white. There are white subtitles at the bottom of the screen.

[0-2] Then the person in front of the excavator walks quickly to the left. An elderly woman in black and white clothes and khaki pants squats down, pulling on the rope tied to the cow with both hands. At the same time, the excavator bucket slowly rises, straightening the rope tied to the bucket and the cow's neck, lifting the cow's head.

[0-2] Then the person in front of the excavator walks quickly to the left. An elderly woman in black and white clothes and khaki pants squats down, pulling on the rope tied to the cow with both hands. At the same time, the excavator bucket slowly rises, straightening the rope tied to the bucket and the cow's neck, lifting the cow's head.

[2-7] Immediately afterward, the excavator lifts the yellow cow out of the pit, turns left, and places the cow on a mound of dirt on the left. The elderly woman in black and white clothes quickly runs to the left and squats beside the cow. The two men in the black short-sleeved shirt and the dark gray short-sleeved shirt walk to the right.

The elderly woman in black and white clothes quickly runs to the left and squats beside the cow. The two men in the black short-sleeved shirt and the dark gray short-sleeved shirt walk to the right.

[7-11] Subsequently, the elderly woman in black and white clothes quickly unties the rope on the bucket, and the excavator retracts its bucket. The elderly woman pulls the cow's head up with the rope, and then the cow's head falls back onto the mound. The man in the black short-sleeved shirt and the man in the gray short-sleeved camouflage pants first walk to the left to look at the cow and then walk to the right.
